name: Idee
overview:
IdÃ©e Inc. develops image identification and visual search software. Its products include TinEye, a reverse image search engine that searches the Internet for images with an image; and TinEye Mobile that enables to search for products using a mobile phone’s camera through taking photograph to start the search and view pricing and reviews for products. The company also provides Piximilar that enables to search various image collections using multicolour and visual similarity; TinEye Music that searches for music with an iPhone camera; and PixID, a video and still-image identification system that provides image monitoring services, which identifies where the images appear in print and online. It provides services to photo wire services, stock photography agencies, media and entertainment companies, software firms, and social content Websites in Toronto, New York, Los Angeles, London, Paris, Silicon Valley, and San Francisco.

The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
